name: Guideflow
tagline: The AI demo automation platform for SaaS
description: Turn your product into interactive demos, sandboxes, demo centers, and live environments your buyers can explore instantly. Capture screens, customize them with AI or with our no-code editor, and Guideflow builds the experience for you - personalized, on-brand, and shareable. No engineering. No waiting. Just pure product experience.

name: Dimension
tagline: AI that connects with your tools and automates the busywork
description: Unlike AI assistants that wait for you to ask, Dimension uses context across your calendar, email, Slack, and Drive to take action proactively. It understands what you're working on and automates the busywork. With deep context about you, your team, and your tools — Dimension anticipates what you need and acts on it. From briefing you before your weekly engineering standup to debugging that Vercel deployment, Dimension handles the busywork so you can ship faster.

name: Ramble by Todoist
tagline: Capture tasks by speaking, wherever you use Todoist
description: Ever wish Todoist could just listen while you think out loud? Now it can. Ramble lets you add tasks by speaking. It turns your words into structured tasks, complete with any details you mention, like projects, dates, deadlines, and priorities. Ramble is in beta, which means all Todoist users get early access while we continue to improve it based on feedback. We’ll introduce a monthly limit for Free plans soon, but until then, use it, break it, tell us what you love (and what you don’t).

name: Spine Canvas
tagline: Go beyond chat & collaborate visually across 300+ AI models
description: Chat is great for Q&A, but real work isn’t linear. Spine Canvas is an unlimited visual workspace for AI that lets you orchestrate 300+ models with a single subscription. Think in blocks (Chat, Deep Research, Apps, Memo, Image, Slides), branch safely, run in parallel, and keep explicit context across everything — all in one collaborative canvas.

name: Gemini 3 Brand Audit
tagline: Find out what Gemini 3 knows about your brand
description: Find out what Gemini 3 thinks about your brand and your competitors.

name: Refbox
tagline: Your floating workspace for inspiration.
description: Refbox is a floating reference app that keeps your inspiration in sight. Stop digging through folders and playing Tetris with windows. All of your references are automatically organized and float above all other apps, so you can see them while you work. Add images, videos, GIFs, and notes via drag & drop from the web or your desktop. It’s the perfect creative companion for illustrators, designers, 3D artists, animators, and visual creators.

name: Color Palette Pro
tagline: A synthesizer for colours
description: Generate customizable color palettes in advanced color spaces that can be easily shared, downloaded, or exported.

name: Magic Mango
tagline: Your marketing team's ad-library for tracking and organizing
description: Magic Mango ends the "blank page" problem by replacing messy screenshot folders with a collaborative AI workspace. Get infinite inspiration by automatically tracking any brand's active ads. Organize your findings into shared team boards to align your strategy. Then, go deep: drag any ad into our AI chat to extract scripts, analyze hooks, and decode the structure in seconds. Stop guessing why ads work—reverse-engineer them.

name: Manus Browser Operator
tagline: Any browser can now become an AI browser
description: One extension that turns any browser into an AI browser. Automate tasks in premium platforms, CRM systems, and authenticated services using your trusted local sessions. Full transparency and control.

name: Karumi
tagline: AI agents that deliver personalized product demos, 24/7.
description: Karumi is an AI agent that joins live video calls to deliver personalized product demos, 24/7 and in any language. It engages visitors at peak intent and introduces a new generation of interactive, self-guided demos that turn curiosity into conversion.

name: ReadMeeting
tagline: AI that summarizes your meetings with a single click
description: ReadMeeting uses powerful AI to automatically summarize your meetings in real time. Capture screen and audio effortlessly, get clear, concise summaries, and save hours of follow-up work. Perfect for teams and professionals who want to stay productive and never miss key points from their meetings.

name: Read AI for Desktop
tagline: Capture conversations wherever they occur
description: Read AI is always on standby with AI meeting notes and transcripts with the introduction of it's desktop application for Windows and Mac. When you aren't able to measure a conversation through our native integrations with Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, and Zoom, our desktop app makes sure that you never miss the opportunity to measure an interaction with this launch.

name: Pavis
tagline: Real-time fact-checking, and manipulation spotting on calls
description: Real-time analysis of your calls. Detect manipulation, fact-check, and come up with unique questions on the spot. Pavis transcribes conversations and instantly detects manipulation tactics, fact-checks claims, and suggests critical questions you'd miss in the moment. Stop walking into bad deals—whether it's investor pitches, sales negotiations, or contractor quotes. See pressure tactics as they happen. Verify statistics before you respond. Ask the questions that change outcomes.

name: Flex AI: Your AI Personal Trainer
tagline: Introducing AI form feedback and AI-powered training coach.
description: Introducing AI form feedback and AI-powered training coach. Flex AI is the world’s first AI personal trainer. The new update (Flex 3.0) introduces real-time AI Form Feedback and Lex—an AI persona that adapts your workout plan, analyzes your lifts, corrects your form instantly, and answers questions about training, recovery, and nutrition.

name: Credyt
tagline: Real-time billing built for AI
description: Credyt is a wallet-native monetization engine built for AI. Define pricing in any currency and charge for usage as it happens from pre-funded credit accounts. Give your customers an Open-AI like billing experience in days not months: top-ups, auto recharge, usage reporting and more.

name: Baselight AI
tagline: AI that knows the facts
description: AI often guesses. Baselight AI knows. It connects language models to structured, verified data, producing answers that are factual, transparent, and reproducible. Combine your private data with Baselight’s global catalog to uncover deeper, connected insights and richer context. Every response includes its data, sources, and logic, giving you full visibility into how each answer is created. Baselight AI turns prediction into understanding you can trust.

name: Signadot Local
tagline: Code and debug microservices locally with live traffic
description: Signadot Local makes developing against a Kubernetes cluster as simple as running a single service on your machine. It brings hot-reloading to the backend by routing live traffic and connecting real dependencies directly to your workstation. Record live traffic, inspect payloads, and override API responses to test failures in real-time. No mocks. No CI waits. Just flow.

name: Avallon
tagline: AI agents for claims operations
description: Avallon turns complex claims operations into automated resolutions, cutting costs  and supercharging adjuster productivity with agentic workflows.

name: WordWise for iOS
tagline: Your personal word journal app, with smart flashcards
description: WordWise is your personal word collection, where you can save words as you translate, customizing them by adding tags, meanings, examples and emojis. Every word becomes a smart flashcard, helping you actually remember what you collect. Excited to bring WordWise to iOS! With new features including word list imports (csv/excel) and easy sharing to grow your vocabulary even faster!

name: Agentplace 2.0
tagline: The easiest way to create AI-powered websites
description: Agentplace 2.0 is a platform for building AI-native websites. Now website becomes an intelligent agent: it assists users, executes tasks, and adapts in real time. With Agentplace 2.0, you can design, implement, and ship fully dynamic AI experiences in one builder. The platform includes version control, automatic bug detection, GitHub Connect, multi-model support (OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, and more), and one-click publishing. Everything you need to build end-to-end AI products.

name: Guideflow
tagline: The AI demo automation platform for SaaS
